Text:
Shit, I downloaded the whole 15gb shit, I JUST ERASED IT ALL from my PC, and now this patch comes in. I FUCKING HATE THIS

According to multiple gaming sites, the patch brings a general performance optimization, supports more gamepads, better physics (clothes, etc), sound fixes, and a bug when you press Esc on the main menu

well my brother have the game and this patch but!

i  dont see a big difirence with this patch! :S
